name: Predator / 20 Second Game Jam 2022
description:
Predator in 20 seconds

This is my entry into the 20 Second Game Jam for 2022. It's a love letter to Predator, one of my favourite films, and Green Beret, one of my favourite retro games. In this short game the Predator has initiated it's self destruct mechanism giving Dutch just 20 seconds to escape the blast radius. Good luck!

Game Controls

Action Game Boy Keyboard Move D-Pad Arrow Keys JumpA Z SprintB X

This game intended to be played on a Game Boy.

If you enjoyed playing this game please consider supporting me on Ko-fi https://ko-fi.com/drgd_retro
